creator: maillist@nue.et-inf.uni-siegen.de
text:
The attribute value (NMTOKENS) is incorrectly handed to the application because 
it is incorrectly normalized... (Only   can be stripped away)...

<!DOCTYPE doc [
<!ATTLIST normNames attr NMTOKENS #IMPLIED>
]>
<doc>
<normNames attr='   A    
	   B   '/>
</doc>

Output of the sample program is:

<!-- in Version Xerces 1.4.1 -->
attr="A 
	 B"

<!-- in Version Xerces 1.4.2 -->
attr="A B"

Created attachment 353
The sample program that demonstrates the Bug
creator: maillist@nue.et-inf.uni-siegen.de

text: Thank you for reporting the problem - it is fixed in CVS.
creator: elena@apache.org
